text: Soni pati am'bichilile aŵala ŵaakukulupilila ma Ȃya Getu, basi jilani: “Ntendele uŵe kukwenu! M'mbuje gwenu alichisisye chanasa, kuti jwatesile mwa jenumanja chakusakala mwaujinga kaneka nikutenda toba panyuma pakwe, ni kwilanya (itendo yakwe), basi Jwalakwe (Allah) ni Jwakululuka kusyene, Jwachanasa channope.”
